energy.usef.core.workflow

Interface WorkflowStep

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AgrControlActiveDemandSupplyStub, AgrCreateConnectionProfileStub, AgrCreateNDayAheadForecastStub, AgrCreateUdiStub, AgrDetectDeviationFromPrognosesStub, AgrDetermineNetDemandsStub, AgrFlexOfferDetermineFlexibilityStub, AgrIdentifyChangeInForecastStub, AgrInitializeNonUdiClustersStub, AgrInitiateSettlementStub, AgrNonUdiCreateNDayAheadForecastStub, AgrNonUdiDetectDeviationFromPrognosesStub, AgrNonUdiReOptimizePortfolioStub, AgrNonUdiRetrieveAdsGoalRealizationStub, AgrNonUdiSetAdsGoalsStub, AgrReCreatePrognosesStub, AgrReOptimizePortfolioStub, AgrUpdateElementDataStoreStub, AgrValidateSettlementItemsStub, BrpCreateMissingAPlansStub, BrpGetNotDesirableFlexOffersStub, BrpInitiateSettlementStub, BrpPlaceFlexOrdersStub, BrpPrepareFlexRequestsStub, BrpReceivedAPlanStub, BrpRequestPenaltyDataStub, DsoCreateFlexRequestStub, DsoCreateGridSafetyAnalysisStub, DsoCreateMissingDPrognosesStub, DsoCreateNonAggregatorForecastStub, DsoDetermineOrangeOutagePeriodsStub, DsoDetermineOrangeReductionPeriodsStub, DsoDetermineOrangeRegimeCompensationsStub, DsoInitiateSettlementStub, DsoLimitConnectionsStub, DsoMeterDataQueryEventsStub, DsoMonitorGridStub, DsoPlaceFlexOrdersStub, DsoPlaceOperateFlexOrdersStub, DsoPostColoringProcessStub, DsoPrepareStepwiseLimitingStub, DsoRequestPenaltyDataStub, DsoRestoreConnectionsStub, MdcMeterDataQueryStub

    public interface WorkflowStep
    General interface used to represent workflow steps. This interface is supposed to be implemented by a customer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WorkflowContext invoke(WorkflowContext context)
      This method should implement role/custom related business logic required by a specific workflow step.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        WorkflowContext invoke(WorkflowContext context)
        This method should implement role/custom related business logic required by a specific workflow step. A Customer is supposed to implement his own business logic in this method.
        Parameters:
        context - Workflow context. This context provides input data for a workflow step.
        Returns:
        Workflow context. This context provides output data for a workflow step.
